name: Cattown
description:
In a world built by and for cats, Cattown represents a cats' dream town. But what if you're not a cat? What if you're different and don't feel like you belong or have a say in this city? What if you're, for example, a newcomer dog?

Cattown is a city game developed for players age 14+. As you explore the virtual world of the game and the physical world of a real city, you will come across challenges that need to be solved using the clues given by the game app and spread in the urban space. As you successfully work out the puzzles, your dog character will slowly regain their autonomy to move around, communicate, create new connections, and much more.

Will you feel at home in Cattown? Put on your sneakers, grab a smartphone and some friends, and go to the starting point of the game. Good luck!
